title: Angola: Bodiva Records Trade Volume Estimated At U.S. 237.0 Million
text:
Zimbabwe: Miners Applaud Lifting of Ban On Chrome Exports 
In his view, the continued fall of the oil prices at the international markets, makes it even more urgent for this alternative and complementary channel for the financing of the economy. 
"To finance the investment promoted by the State itself and the business community, therefore, he stressed that all the conditions for the full functioning of a securities market are created, which are capable to meet the financing needs of the State and companies from domestic savings and by attracting foreign capital", he said.
